title: Tech Trader - Investing in Tech Stocks Amid the Downturn
description: Barron's associate editor for technology Eric Savitz speaks with Dan Niles, founder and senior portfolio manager of Satori Fund on how to invest in tech stocks amid the downturn.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's associate editor for technology Eric Savitz speaks with Dan Niles, founder and senior portfolio manager of Satori Fund on how to invest in tech stocks amid the downturn.
